name: CurieVision, Inc.
description: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
one_liner: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Ecommerce, Retail, VR/AR, Deep Tech, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Mobile, Commerce

name: FLEX FINANCIAL TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
description: Developer of a spend management platform designed to help small and medium-sized enterprises to manage and track expenses. The company's platform provides an intuitive user interface, insights, digital requisitions, bulk payment transfers, budgeting, and expense tracking, enabling businesses to digitize their daily operations.
one_liner: Developer of a spend management platform designed to help small and medium-sized enterprises to manage and track expenses. The company's platform provides an intuitive user interface, insights, digital requisitions, bulk payment transfers, budgeting, and expense tracking, enabling businesses to digitize their daily operations.

name: Pandai Education Pte. Ltd.
description: Developer of a learning application designed for students to get better grades in school. The company's application provides gamified quizzes aligned to a specific school curriculum, practice questions, and learning materials, enabling students to learn, practice, get feedback, and diagnose weaknesses through a fun and engaging learning experience.
one_liner: Developer of a learning application designed for students to get better grades in school. The company's application provides gamified quizzes aligned to a specific school curriculum, practice questions, and learning materials, enabling students to learn, practice, get feedback, and diagnose weaknesses through a fun and engaging learning experience.

name: RapChat, LLC.
description: Developer of a music-making platform designed to help artists record and share songs from the phone. The company's platform provides users with access to a social network of audience and artists that help drive connectivity and collaboration via its mobile recording studio that features various music-making tools, enabling artists to make content and deliver it directly to their audience with ease.
one_liner: Developer of a music-making platform designed to help artists record and share songs from the phone. The company's platform provides users with access to a social network of audience and artists that help drive connectivity and collaboration via its mobile recording studio that features various music-making tools, enabling artists to make content and deliver it directly to their audience with ease.

name: Auto Chilango, Inc.
description: Provider of legal and bureaucracy assistance for cars. The company engages in development of a mobile phone application that provides traffic alerts, insurance management and other vital information that helps people to manage everything that is necessary with having a car in Mexico City.
